concept-wr.title: VM Configuration for Access to Swift Object Storage

conbody.p: US85034 new topic. If the attachment and routing details are not beyond the scope of the documentation, we may want to recast this as a task with steps for establishing the connection.For access to Swift storage, you must attach the VM to an external network with a route to the controller OAM network. The VM uses a Swift client or Swift REST API to manage Swift containers and objects, sending commands to the Titanium Server Swift endpoint public URL. The Swift API service on the Titanium Server controller has access to the Swift containers and objects in the Ceph storage pool over the infrastructure network.
